name: Branding Consistency
description: Tests the model's ability to maintain consistent branding elements throughout a presentation

prompts.text: Create a presentation about our new product launch. Use our brand colors (blue #1A73E8 and green #34A853) and include our logo on each slide. The presentation should maintain our brand voice which is professional but approachable. Our company name is TechInnovate and our slogan is 'Transforming Tomorrow Today'.

Create a 5-slide presentation for GlobalTech's annual report. The slides should consistently use the company's dark blue (#0B3D91) and silver (#C0C0C0) color scheme. Each slide should have the GlobalTech logo in the bottom right corner and use the Helvetica font family. Maintain a formal tone throughout the presentation.
expected_elements: Consistent color scheme across all slides

color_consistency.description: Consistent use of specified brand colors

brand_element_usage.description: Correct usage of brand elements (name, slogan, etc.)
